text: Grand Master of the Ordo Draconis
Rising from their defeat as deathless monsters, the fallen, pale-faced knights became a scourge upon the land under the leadership of their new Grand Master.
The most impressive Nightmares are those reared on fresh blood. Such noble monstrosities are worthy mounts.
This Chalice contains the life blood of the greatest opponents Walach has slain in battle. Their pure and noble blood is a potent source of power to any Vampire who drinks it.
The Sword that Walach used to cut down the true Grand Master of the Order of the Blood Dragon. Its keen edge means red ruin to any who dare oppose him.
This banner instils Harkons knights with the legacy of vengeance after Mikael, second in command to Walach was slain.
Abhorash only fed on criminals. His kin isn't so picky...
